item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "Hello," Newel said. "Look, Doren, we have visitors. Kendra, Seth, and ... Muriel's weirdo puppet."....Newel grabbed Seth's hand and shook it vigorously. "Congratulations. You just found yourself a secret entrance." "So seriously," Doren said. "What's with the puppet?" -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "Then I'm going?" Kendra asked. The adults in the room exchanged tacit glances before nodding. Then we only have one more problem left to discuss," Seth said. Everyone turned to him. How do I get invited" -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "ROBBING GRAVES! SHES ASKING US TO ROB GRAVES!" -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "FABLEHAVEN: None who enter will leave unchanged. Trespassers will be turned to stone." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "A crossbow?” Pigeon asked. I left my battle-ax in my other jeans,” the man said." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "There are no insect eggs in my food.” Mrs. White reiterated. You should use that in your advertising,” Nate suggested." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "Could you just call me Pigeon?” he asked the teacher when she read his name. “Does your mother call you Pigeon?” “No.” “Then to me you are Paul.” ... “Nathan Sutter,” the teacher read. “My mother never calls me Nathan.” “Is it Nate?” “She calls me Honeylips." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "Are you her boyfriend?” ... No, I’m her fiancé.” Nate said. We’ve been promised to each other since birth,” Summer added. Our wedding isn’t until March." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Ben add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "Hard to call it a party without sardines." -- Brandon Mull
